questions.questionTitle: What problem do the speakers have?
When will the storage room be ready to use?
What does the woman suggest they do?
anwers: Store some boxes in the conference room
Move their meeting into the storage room
Help the painters finish their work
Stop the shipment of new supplies

script:
� I thought the storage room was supposed to be ready today. It's getting hard to work in the office with all of these boxes.
� Actually, it was finished yesterday, but the painters said it will take two days to dry.
� Well, that's going to present a problem. There's another shipment of supplies arriving this afternoon.
� Let's move some of the boxes into the conference room. It's not being used until next Thursday.
